name: IsInParty
comment: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; if bit is set the party function is activated for the corresponding HC

name: HwcLaggingTime2
comment: Time pump is running after energy demand is met

name: FlowTempDesired2
comment: Flow setpoint if tank has an energy demand

name: HcParallelStorageFillingEnabled2
comment: Heating cuircuits can be loaded in parallel to an active tank loading

name: HwcLoadingDelay2
comment: Time waiting for a heating demand in caser of solar gain

name: OperatingMode2
comment: Operating mode of the water circuit

name: TeleswitchOperatingMode2
comment: If the tele switch port is activated the water circuit operates in this mode
